alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:19PM CDT until July 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LAKE COUNTY... At 918 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Park City, or near Gurnee, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waukegan, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Round Lake Beach, Zion, Grayslake, Libertyville, Round Lake, Antioch, Wauconda, Fox Lake, Lake Villa, Lindenhurst, Beach Park, Gages Lake, Park City, Round Lake Park, Winthrop Harbor and Lakemoor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
